| icon           = poe2 ring_gold_amethyst icon.png
| description    = Rings can feature plain bands or jewels in settings. Magical rings may bestow a variety of special properties or defenses on the wearer. Their small size allows their enchantments to complement similar enchantments from other items and spells, and this versatility has made them popular among adventurers.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Fingers
| item_type      = Ring
| item_category  = Accessory

| rel_items      = 
| rel_abilities  = 
| rel_talents    = 
| internalname   = Ring_of_Overseeing
| location       = * Worn by many characters who are in a position of power.
* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): Sold by [Tiabo](/tiabo/).
* [Crookspur](/crookspur/): Hidden stash on the desk beside [Master Kua](/masterKua/).
* [Arkemyr's Manor](/arkemyrsManor/): In a drawer in the corner of the bedroom.
* [Port Maje Harbor](/portMajeHarbor/): Sold by [Well-traveled Supplier](/wellTraveledSupplier/) (with [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessing/) "Unique Item Vendor" enabled).
* Can be looted from [Chief Echoing-Strike](/chiefEchoingStrike/).
* Can be looted from [Tāhae](/tahae/).
* Can be obtained as random loot from a Burial Site or Abandoned Village.
| guid           = 17d00763-b407-47d8-a224-14cd14bb1b0d
